original_title: Xenosaga Episode I: Der Wille zur Macht
overview: Collecting over 4 hours of cinematics from Xenosaga Episode 1, this limited collector's edition DVD is a must-have for Xenosaga fans and newcomers alike.
tagline: Thousands of years into the future, mankind exists only in deep space.
title: Xenosaga Episode I: Der Wille zur Macht
